message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it offers exceptional value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value.
Bob, thanks for your interest.  While I understand your perspective on the value, $6,000 is significantly below what I can accept.  Could you do $10,000?

I understand you're looking to make a profit, but I'm still thinking $8,000 is a reasonable price for the product. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $9,000, but I'm not willing to go any higher.
